listitem.para: Whether to show the MantisBT version at the bottom of each page or not. Default is OFF.
String appended to the MantisBT version when displayed to the user. Default is ''.

Custom copyright and licensing statement shown at the footer of each page. Can contain HTML elements that are valid children of the <address> element. This string is treated as raw HTML and thus you must use & instead of &. Default is ''.
